setNymulator(String) - Method in class com.nymi.api.NymiAdapter
Sets up NymiAdapter to interact with Nymulator ecosystem at specified host (instead of system bluetooth to talk to physical Nymi Bands).

Sets up NymiAdapter to interact with a non-standard Nymulator ecosystem configuration.
